name: kumii-api-gateway-monorepo
description: KUMII API Management & Routing System - Production-grade monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gateway-server && npm install && cd ../admin-client && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf gateway-server/node_modules gateway-server/dist admin-client/node_modules admin-client/dist node_modules
scripts.lint: echo 'Running lint checks...' && cd gateway-server && npm run lint && cd ../admin-client && npm run lint
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && cd gateway-server && npm test && cd ../admin-client && npm test

author: KUMII Platform
